message: I have a unique and valuable product that I'm excited to offer to you. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $8000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9000?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, and I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession. I'm counteroffering at $9800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $9200?
